cards.title: The Art of Noticing
cards.blurb: In a world of endless distractions, the ability to notice the small details might be our most valuable skill.
cards.author: Rob Walker

cards.title: Why Books Don't Work
cards.blurb: Books are surprisingly bad at conveying knowledge, and readers mostly don't realize it.
cards.author: Andy Matuschak

cards.title: The Bus Ticket Theory of Genius
cards.blurb: What determines people who achieve extraordinary things? The answer might surprise you.
cards.author: Paul Graham
